content.meaning: a small block of data created by a web server while a user is browsing a website
content.example: The information of the users is collected and stored on their computers.

content.meaning: the unique name which identifies a website
content.example: The domain name of Google is google.com.

content.meaning: a connection that allows you to move easily between two computer documents or two pages on the Internet
content.example: The woman asked her professor if the textbook was available as hypertext.

content.meaning: a global hypertext system operating on the Internet
content.example: The World Wide Web is the best thing to happen to computing since the birth of the PC.
